name: El Buble
additionalNotes:
Privada CC monthly selection for May '23.

https://privadacigarclub.com/shop/el-buble-aged-2-years/

"The Buble is a Nicaraguan puro cigar that sets itself apart with its distinct and nostalgic flavor. Made exclusively from Nicaraguan tobacco, the small factory of Tabaco de Espléndido has deftly crafted this remarkable cigar. Situated on a road between Estelí and Condega in Nicaragua, Tabaco de Espléndido is a small and tight-knit factory with only 17 pairs of rollers. The factory owner, who is half Cuban and half Nicaraguan, ensures that the operation runs smoothly, resulting in some of the finest cigars around. Despite its humble size, the factory exudes charm, with its cinder and stone structure and lively salsa and merengue music. The staff prepares lunch in a delightful courtyard, providing an immersive experience for visitors. The Buble’s one-of-a-kind taste is achieved through a careful combination of different tobacco flavors. Its remarkable flavor profile is sure to appeal to any cigar enthusiast. Overall, The Buble is a testament to the idea that small factories can produce exceptional products and compete with larger, established brands. Whether you’re a cigar club member or a casual smoker, The Buble is a must-try."
